EmailTemplate.subject: Save the date
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.perrier-jouet.com/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Save the date
3 February 2016, Wednesday Journey through the world of
'SMALL DISCOVERIES' BY MISCHER'TRAXLER
LAUNCH PARTY
Alkaff Mansion
Ristorante Level 1
10 Telok Blangah Green, Singapore 109178
6.30pm – 9.00pm
Dress Code: Garden Chic You have previously provided Pernod Ricard with your personal data to be used in accordance with our Privacy Policy <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/SGN_Perrier-Jouet-Generic-Registration_Page---Privacy-Policy.html]]>. Occasionally, we will send marketing communications to you regarding special offers and events that we believe may be relevant and useful to you. If you wish to unsubscribe to these communications, please click here <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>.
